list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the action of evacuating a person or a place.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there were waves of evacuation during the blitz
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Có những đợt sơ tán trong Blitz

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the action of emptying the bowels or another bodily organ.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: patients with a feeling of incomplete evacuation
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bệnh nhân có cảm giác sơ tán không hoàn toàn
